stations

Class StationsView

  • java.lang.Object
    • stations.StationsView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, stations.StationsContract.View

    public class StationsView
extends java.lang.Object
implements stations.StationsContract.View, java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
    The user interface view for presenting favourites, states and weather stations. Created by michael on 5/04/16. Modified by kendall on 18/04/16.
    Author:
    michael, kendall
